title: Detailed analyses
text:
This page contains (1) an extended analysis of the anxiety data from the teaching presentation using MASS::polr().
It also illustrates two less good ways to analyse ordinal data: (2) just treating it as numeric and using a Gaussian model, and (3) first converting it to z-scores and then using a Gaussian model.

(1) Ordinal regression with polr()
lorem ipsum


(2) Gaussian regression model with lm()
lorem ipsum


(3) z-score conversion then Gaussian regression model with lm()
